name: arconic-pcs-telemetry-dashboard
description: **PCS-inspired simulation of Arconic’s rolling mill operations** — a full-stack project showcasing **real-time telemetry monitoring**, **anomaly detection**, **defect logging**, and **shift-based reporting**.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
